trans-unit.source: Represents the shared-connection version of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> service used by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Representa a versão da conexão compartilhada do serviço <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> usado pelo tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: In this context, shared-connection means that the service uses the same SQL connection for both the tracking and persistence services.
trans-unit.target: Nesse contexto, a conexão compartilhada significa que o serviço usa a mesma conexão de SQL para o serviço de acompanhamento e o de persistência.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> service is used for database transactions that use a shared connection between different objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> serviço é usado para transações de banco de dados que usam uma conexão compartilhada entre diferentes objetos.

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> instead of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> in your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> instance, use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> em vez do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> no seu <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> instância, use o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If the SQL server used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> is down such as that caused by SQL cluster failovers or intermittent network issues, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> will retry the commit process up to 20 times before raising a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: Se o SQL server usado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> é baixo como causada por failovers de cluster SQL ou problemas intermitentes de rede, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> tentará novamente o processo de confirmação até 20 vezes antes de gerar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O construtor é invocado quando o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho carrega os serviços de um arquivo de configuração de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The valid key is <c>EnableRetries</c>.
trans-unit.target: A chave válida é <c>EnableRetries</c>.

trans-unit.source: This requests that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> retry in case of a failed database connection.
trans-unit.target: Isso solicita que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> faça novas tentativas em caso de uma conexão de banco de dados com falha.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" />.

trans-unit.source: Database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de conexão de banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> class using a database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> usando uma cadeia de conexão de banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService.CommitWorkBatchCallback" /> delegate to call to commit the work batch.
trans-unit.target: O delegado <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService.CommitWorkBatchCallback" /> para chamar a confirmar o lote de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Creates a transaction if one does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma transação se ainda não existir nenhuma.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value specifying whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> will retry committing a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define um valor que especifica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> tentará novamente confirmar um lote de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o serviço deverá repetir a confirmar o lote de trabalho; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Retries of work batch commits for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> activities must be modeled into the workflow (usually using a while loop and exception handler outside of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).
trans-unit.target: Tentativas de trabalho em lotes confirmações <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> atividades devem ser modeladas no fluxo de trabalho (normalmente usando um pouco manipulador de loop e a exceção fora do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> cannot do retries in this case because it did not start (and therefore does not own) the transaction.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> não é possível fazer tentativas neste caso porque ele não foi iniciado (e, portanto, não possuir) a transação.

trans-unit.source: Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Além do que está sendo definido programaticamente, essa funcionalidade pode ser habilitada por meio de um arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como definir essa propriedade através de um arquivo de configuração, consulte [arquivos de configuração do fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).

trans-unit.source: For general information on retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações gerais sobre repetindo as transações do trabalho em lotes, consulte [informações de estado de processamento em lotes em fluxos de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called when the workflow runtime raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método chamado quando o tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho gera o evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called to start the service.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método chamado para iniciar o serviço.
